extendedInfo.description: Car Compass automatically records your car location when your phone disconnects with your car's bluetooth device. You can also manually record the location by clicking a button after parking the car. Car Compass helps you get to your car using a map. An arrow points to the location of your car. Walking navigation directions are available as well.Key features:- Automatically records car location by monitoring the connection to your car's bluetooth device (no additional software needs to be installed)- Records car location using wifi signature if a GPS fix cannot be obtained (this happens in an indoor parking garage)- Map shows location of car. Arrow points to car- Walking navigation directions- Add notes for car location- Share car location via Email, SMS etc.- Parking timer- Conserves battery by turning on your phone's GPS only when needed.Enjoy this free app. Please don't forget to submit reviews and ratings.For an ad-free, faster version of this app with more features, download Car Compass Pro from the Android Marketplace: http://market.android.com/details?id=com.datawrx.android.carcompasspro

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just tried it at my house and it showed the picture of my front of my front door pretty cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little app
reviews.comment: The beauty is: it does nod need your attention until you really lost your car, and then it had position automagically recorded for you. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Car compass is an awesome app
reviews.comment: You will never have to struggle to find your vehicle. No need to remember to mark the spot you parked at, it is all done automatically if you have blue tooth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A fine app for draining ones battery. Other than that, all I see is a blank screen.
reviews.author: A Google User
